sentences.en: The show is very cleverly choreographed.
sentences.cn: 这个节目的舞蹈动作设计得非常好。

sentences.en: The stunt performers have been taking advantage of the lighter weight to choreograph even faster moves.
sentences.cn: 更轻的光剑有助于特技表演者设计比以往更迅捷的打斗动作.

sentences.en: This was a show they had helped to choreograph, sometimes in minute detail.
sentences.cn: 这是一场他们设计的表演, 甚至有时具体指导其中的微小细节.

trans.tran_en: to arrange how dancers should move during a performance
